thread.title: NHL email in concussion lawsuit makes league look bad - NHL -
thread.title_full: NHL email in concussion lawsuit makes league look bad - NHL - SI.com

author: Allan Muir
title: NHL email in concussion lawsuit makes league look bad - NHL -
text:
by Allan Muir Twitter Email Posted: Thu Oct. 15, 2015
Itâ€™s cold and callous and probably the last thing the NHL needs, but an email that appears to marginalize retired players who are suffering from long-term concussion issues creates more of a PR problem for the league than a legal one.
The email, written in 2009 by NHL Deputy General Counsel Julie Grand to Commissioner Gary Bettman and Deputy Commissioner Bill Daly, is part of a group of documents related to ongoing concussion litigation that was ordered unsealed by the court.
NHL SI Vault: Chris Pronger has a headache by Brian Cazeneuve
